wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Joseph Maximilian Shinkwin, Baron Shinkwin (born 7 June 1971) is a British Conservative politician and member of the House of Lords.

response: * Kevin Shinkwin, Baron Shinkwin, Conservative politician and member of the House of Lords (osteogenesis imperfecta, or "brittle bone syndrome")Lindy McDowell, Northern Ireland is the safest place to be if you are an unborn baby who has a disability, Belfast Telegraph, 5 November 2018 (accessed on 18 July 2019)
